SEARCH
Package utils

Class ValidationUtils

java.lang.Object
utils.ValidationUtils
public class ValidationUtils extends Object
ValidationUtils class providing input validation methods for the contact management system. Includes validation for phone numbers, emails, dates, and other data types. Supports Turkish character validation and proper error handling.
Version:
1.0
Author:
CMPE-343 Project Group

      public static boolean isValidEmail(String email)
      Validates an email address. Email must be in lowercase format (e.g., name.surname@email.com)
      Parameters:
      email - The email address to validate
      Returns:
      true if valid, false otherwise

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      true if valid, false otherwise

      public static boolean isValidDate(String dateString)

      Parameters:
      dateString - The date string to validate
      Returns:
      true if valid, false otherwise

    • isValidBirthDate

      public static boolean isValidBirthDate(String dateString)
      Validates a date string and checks if it's a valid birth date. Birth date must be in the past and person must be less than 150 years old.
      Parameters:
      dateString - The birth date string to validate
      Returns:
      true if valid, false otherwise
